TopicTitle: The what mods to get Megathread

Articles.Content:
Okay! I am an avid KSP fan, and I have started many different career modes, many of which are not modded. So, I have created a post to see what mods you guys also would suggest to those who want to spice up their KSP experience. Only 1 to 3 mods per post!

I'll start:

Interstellar v2 was repackaged and updated, and I just found out about this a few days ago. It's a great get to make the stock Kerbol system (and the Outer Planets Mod if you have it!) much more enhanced visually. It even adds lightning strikes which look amazing from orbit!

Download: https://spacedock.info/mod/1268/Astronomer's Visual Pack: Interstellar v2 (Updated and Repackaged)

DECQ's soyuz and KOS (with my KOS scripts for it)

because the soyuz is epicly awsome

22 minutes ago, kerbinorbiter said:

DECQ's soyuz and KOS (with my KOS scripts for it)

because the soyuz is epicly awsome

Nice! The Soyuz is a beautiful craft.

• Final Frontier-Awesome mod, tracks which kerbals did what, like first landing on Mun, first Orbit, first EVA, just an amazing mod!
  • Dmagic Orbital Science-Adds a ton of science experiments, and if used with contract configurator, it can make some really fun (and lucrative) contracts
  • SCANsat-adds about five parts, it's really fun to make mapsats for, well, mapping the surface of planets
  • Contract Configurator-it allows you to make custom contracts, it also has a really nice organization for deciding which contracts you want to accept, you want to see only part testing contracts? alright! here you go!
  • Outer Planets Mod-I've never been to them, but used with Distant object enhancement, it really fills up the night sky!
  • Distant Object Enhancement-you can see things far away, what more do you want?
